name: ガンプル Gunman's Proof
summary:
Ganpuru: Gunman's Proof is a Action Role-Playing game, developed by Lenar and published by ASCII Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1997.
This action-RPG is actually way more action-oriented than its model, the legendary A Link to the Past. It may not be as complete as the Nintendo legend, but it’s also more original and more inventive. The gameplay is excellent and the universe is one of a kind, so you shouldn’t miss out on this one. Besides, there really is a bazooka!
